inkball

类 Vec

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Vec

  • public class Vec
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vec class represents a 2D vector with x and y components. It provides methods for vector operations such as distance calculation, addition, normalization, and dot product.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Vec(float x, float y)
      Constructor for the Vec class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Vec add(Vec v)
      Adds another vector to this vector and returns the result.
      float distanceTo(Vec other)
      Calculates the distance between this vector and another vector.
      float dot(Vec other)
      Calculates the dot product of this vector and another vector.
      Vec normal()
      Calculates the normal vector to this vector.
      Vec normalize()
      Normalizes this vector, returning a unit vector in the same direction.
      Vec[] perpendicular()
      Returns the two perpendicular (normal) vectors to this vector, normalized.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Vec

        public Vec(float x,
           float y)
        Constructor for the Vec class. Initializes the vector with given x and y components.
        参数:
        x - The x component of the vector.
        y - The y component of the vector.

    • 方法详细资料

      • distanceTo

        public float distanceTo(Vec other)
        Calculates the distance between this vector and another vector.
        参数:
        other - The other vector to calculate the distance to.
        返回:
        The distance between the two vectors.

      • add

        public Vec add(Vec v)
        Adds another vector to this vector and returns the result.
        参数:
        v - The vector to add.
        返回:
        A new Vec representing the sum of this vector and the given vector.

      • normal

        public Vec normal()
        Calculates the normal vector to this vector. Returns the normalized version of the normal vector.
        返回:
        A new Vec representing the normalized normal vector.

      • normalize

        public Vec normalize()
        Normalizes this vector, returning a unit vector in the same direction.
        返回:
        A new Vec representing the normalized vector.

      • perpendicular

        public Vec[] perpendicular()
        Returns the two perpendicular (normal) vectors to this vector, normalized.
        返回:
        An array of two normalized perpendicular vectors.

      • dot

        public float dot(Vec other)
        Calculates the dot product of this vector and another vector.
        参数:
        other - The other vector to calculate the dot product with.
        返回:
        The dot product of the two vectors.
